author: costin
msg: Fix the import * ( a bit late, sorry ).
Increase the time that trigers a message ( too many classes take more
than 100ms to load ). I'll make it configurable - it is very usefull
to see a small log for the classes that take a long time to load, it
may raise a bit awarness on performance.

author: costin
msg: Build the factory for the java: context in a separate jar ( naming-java.jar ).
This allows a more friendly integration of tomcat in other applications
that use their own java: namespace. ( i.e. just remove catalina java: ns )

author: costin
msg: Another small change ( I hope I won't be killed ! ) - disable the
validation for struts .dtds ( also to reduce time ).

author: costin
msg: I hope it won't break anything - moved the initialization in a background
thread, to reduce the server startup time.
It should be changed back when ( if ) the generic 'background context loading'

author: amyroh
msg: Port change to configure how JNDI should handle referrals returned by the server.
